Text.Page:
Let's see, what else do I have here...ah! I'll need you to get rid of the {@LinkCreature:19#2001#crazed}, {@LinkCreature:19#2003#wild}, {@LinkCreature:19#3001#berserk}, and {@LinkCreature:19#3003#reaping harvester golems} around Thrallfield.

Speak to Cardis when you're done.
Oh, good! Thank you. Please take this for what you've done.
I would love to reward you, but you must do something first.
